attributes.action: Ban political asylum for corrupt politicians and revoke multiple period visas.
attributes.additional_details:
Nigeria
Russia
Turkey
Pakistan 
and so many other countries mentioned in the Panama papers.
attributes.background: So many corrupt politicians dumped their money in the UK through their offshore companies . That money belongs to the people of those poor countries. Some of them are dealt with by their own courts. We also do not want to make London the hub of these criminals.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
